front.title: Problem Statement and Gap Analysis for Connecting to Cloud DCs via Optical Networks

abstract.t: Many applications, including optical leased line, cloud VR and computing cloud, benefit from the network scenario where the data traffic to cloud data centers (DCs) is carried end-to-end over an optical network. This document describes the problem statement and requirements for connecting to cloud DCs over optical networks, and presents a gap analysis for existing control plane protocols for supporting this network scenario.
